name: ConnectNow
overview:
ConnectNow is the digital, social business card service that is designed to enhance the connections you already have in your life…and the ones that have yet to come.

The app is built for today’s social media infused society in where a person’s Facebook or LinkedIn is just as, if not more, valuable than their phone number or email address.

The user profile brings together the primary social media profiles (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) alongside the user’s phone number and email address to one platform. Users have the ability to connect through these different networks without having to toggle between different apps.
